amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 41, 61, 62, 63, 64, 66, 69, 70, 71, 73, 74, 75, 76, 110, 112, 125, 138, 156, 157, and 160 printed in part A of House Report 113-460. See page D544 of the Congressional Record for May 21, 2014, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 4 consisting of amendments numbered 41, 61, 62, 63, 64, 66, 69, 70, 71, 73, 74, 75, 76, 110, 112, 125, 138, 156, 157, and 160 printed in Part A of House Report 113-460.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A022) offered by Mr. McKeon.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A022) offered by Mr. McKeon.
